content: it s time for another stash busting baby blankie this time it s a modified feather and fan stitch you can find this stitch in a treasury of knitting patterns 1 by barbara walker and throughout the internet 2 basically i eliminated the purl row this makes for a reversible blanket a sought-after feature in any blanket 1 http //www amazon com/gp/product/0942018168/ref=as_li_ss_tl ie=utf8&amp camp=1789&amp creative=390957&amp creativeasin=0942018168&amp linkcode=as2&amp tag=lab5091-20 2 https //www google com/search q=feather+and+fan+stitch&amp aq=f&amp oq=feather+and+fan+stitch&amp sugexp=chrome mod=0&amp sourceid=chrome&amp ie=utf-8
